channel.title: [EDIT] How do I make things so they require a skill?
channel.description: For example, when you click Dragon Bow, I want it to say "You need 60 Ranged for this!". Any help? Thanks.

item.title: [EDIT] How do I make things so they require a skill?
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

Thanks guys, I’ll try it out.
I’m using RichScape btw.

item.title: [EDIT] How do I make things so they require a skill?
item.dc:creator: @Problem Problem
item.description:
@Problem wrote:

I dont know what source you are using but …

Client.java
Ctrl + F

Search

public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) {

Then you should see:

if (ItemID == 14082) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 11154) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 11155) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 859) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 861) { return 1; 
    if (ItemID == 1135) {
        return 40;
    }</blockquote>

( If you have there somthing )

Under :

if (ItemID == 1135) { return 40; }
Add:
if (ItemID == 15156) { return 60; }
